title: How to earn the free chest?
body: How to earn the free chest that when people get s? I didn't earn the chest when I got s on my champions

replies.body: There are a few requirements to be eligible for a mastery chest, such as owning the champion and having an available slot to obtain a chest for that week.  More details on this can also be found at our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Hopefully, that clears things up but let me know if you have any questions.
Riot plz help me with some way. I didn't earn the chest when i go S on a game. Why??
